name: Lucky Lefty Loves Loops
description:
Lucky Lefty Lo❤️es Loops! The luminous life that a leftward leaning snail leads likens to a long lost love that you never knew you left.  Play as Lucky Lefty as you uncover the meaning of the universe! 🤯

WSDA or arrow keys for movement

R to restart lap

Esc to go back to previous screen

Game by: TheBookSnail

Snail art and animation by: ElysiaGriffin
